name: Monster Apocalypse
description:
Monster Apocalypse is a top down shooter game made for Ludum Dare Game Jam!

In this game you should play as a monkey to kill monsters who are trying to capture the forest. Your goal is to save your friends from those monsters. You can throw bananas from the awesome banana gun (LOL) to kill the enemies. Have Fun and comment below your review! 

This is my first Game Jam Submission. Made in 50 hours.
